description.narrative: This activity (DAC Contributions) is a component of DFID ENGAGMENT With the Work of the DAC reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £1,104,885. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Sectors not specified. , with the following implementing partners: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD). The start date is 01-04-2008 and the end date is 30-09-2011.
